verse: आनुकूल्यस्य संकल्पः प्रातिकूल्यस्य वर्जनम् । रक्षिष्यतीति विश्वासो गोप्तृत्ववरणं तथा। आत्मनिक्षेपकार्पण्ये षड्विधा शरणागतिः ॥(भ.र.सि.)

terms.गोप्तृत्ववरणं: refuge or protection of the Supreme Being
terms.शरणागतिः: refuge or surrender to the Supreme

meaning: This verse from the Brahma Sutras talks about the various aspects of surrendering oneself to the Supreme Being or God. It highlights the importance of having a positive mindset and avoiding negativity. It emphasizes having faith and trust in the Supreme, surrendering oneself completely, and seeking refuge in the protection provided by the Supreme. The verse also mentions the sixfold ways in which one can surrender themselves to the Supreme.
